Kama jinsi ambavyo uwazi ni jukumu la serikali, ni jukumu pia la taasisi zisizo za kiserikali ili jamii ione & kuelewa kazi zao. #OGPAfrica
Azerbaijan always strives to develop intercultural dialogue and (cont) http://t.co/WsXIotM4yj
For centuries, all cultures, religions and ethnic groups have lived in Azerbaijan as a family of peace and tranquility.
Today there are dangerous trends in various parts of the world such as ethnic, religious, sectarian discrimination, neo-fascist movement
There is no alternative to multiculturalism. Alternative alternative to multiculturalism, discrimination, (cont) http://t.co/dRLDW2jvO2
One of the most important elements of promoting cultural diversity and intercultural dialogue is education.
Idadi na uhuru wa vyombo vya habari ni kipimo cha uwazi. Tuna magazeti & majarida 825, vituo vya runinga 28 & vya redio 95. #OGPAfrica
Education is a safeguard against extremism, fundamentalism, terrorism, and insurance against the dangerous elements of modern life.
Azerbaijan's initiatives are aimed at strengthening regional cooperation and the region's borders (cont) http://t.co/fZUwwJT6tJ
The first European Games to be held in Azerbaijan will not only be a great sporting event, but also a friendly and partnership event.
Tumepiga hatua katika kuwa na nchi inayoamini uwazi & demokrasia. Mfano: miaka 9 nyuma vituo vya redio vilikuwa 36, leo ni 95. #OGPAfrica
Taasisi za Kiraia lazima zihudumie jamii. Dira hii inapotea kama waendeshaji watahudumu bila uwazi na kujinufaisha wenyewe. #OGPAfrica
Kadiri ambavyo tunaamini katika uwazi na uhuru wa kutoa maoni yetu, tuamini pia katika kufuata utaratibu uliopo kufanya hivyo. #OGPAfrica
Nchi yetu ina uhuru mkubwa wa raia kutoa maoni yao, lakini pia uhuru huu lazima uwe na mipaka. Vinginevyo tutaingia matatizoni. #OGPAfrica
Kamwe hatutaruhusu mtu au watu, kutumia uhuru huu vibaya katika chombo chochote, na kuiingiza nchi yetu katika matatizo. #OGPAfrica
Miswada iliyopo na sheria zinazopitishwa zina utaratibu wa kujadiliwa na kurekebishwa kadiri ya mahitaji. Tusisite kufanya hivyo. #OGPAfrica
Ni imani yangu kubwa sana kwamba, tutapata Rais ajaye ambaye anaamini katika uwazi kama nguzo kubwa ya kukuza demokrasia. #OGPAfrica
Katika kujenga jamii yenye uwazi tukumbuke kwamba, serikali iliyochaguliwa na wananchi yapaswa kuheshimiwa katika utendaji wake. #OGPAfrica
Tunaishukuru @opengovpart kwa fursa ya Tanzania kuwa mwenyeji wa #OGPAfrica 2015. Ni ishara ya imani ya uwazi kiutendaji katika nchi yetu.
@McMalembo Nakubaliana na wewe. Tunaamini katika majadiliano. Nchi hii imejengwa katika misingi hiyo, na itaendelea katika misingi hiyo.
@DavidRDCongo Aksante sana.
@KatresB Sahihi. Uhuru wa kujieleza au kutoa maoni una utaratibu. Vinginevyo ni fujo, na ni jukumu la serikali kuona hilo halitokei.
@beka_mtanzania ni kweli. Aksante.
@mwakasola Aksante sana.

"The best scientists in the world know that climate change is happening." —President Obama #ActOnClimate
"The planet is getting warmer. Fourteen of the 15 hottest years on record have been in the past 15 years." —President Obama #ActOnClimate
"Cadets, the threat of a changing climate cuts to the very core of your service." —President Obama to the U.S. Coast Guard Academy graduates
"Denying it or refusing to deal with it endangers our national security." —President Obama on climate change #ActOnClimate
"Climate change—and especially rising seas—is a threat to our homeland security." —President Obama #ActOnClimate
"The only way the world is going to prevent the effects of climate change is to slow down the warming of the planet." —President Obama
"It will not be easy, it will require sacrifices, and the politics will be tough. But there is no other way." —President Obama #ActOnClimate
"This cannot be subject to the usual politics and the usual rhetoric." —President Obama on climate change #ActOnClimate

RT @blogplanalto: #AoVivo Statement by the President @dilmabr on the occasion of the visit of the President of Uruguay to Brazil: http://t.co/9nVg1LXgR...
RT @TVNBR: LIVE: President Dilma Rousseff and President of Uruguay, Tabaré Vázquez, make a statement to the press http://t.co/p3mX3NcIFQ
It is a great pleasure to receive in Brazil the President Tabaré Vázquez, in the 1st international visit he realizes after his 2nd election.
I receive not only the Head of State of a brother country, but a dear political leader, who has done much for the people of his country.
Hi @qataharraymond. i will.
In the field of energy integration, we welcome the conclusion, in April, of the 411 km San Carlos-Candiota transmission line. #BrasilUruguai
This interconnection project is added to the Uruguayan wind farm Artillerosio, which produces 65MW, which I inaugurated in February.
These initiatives are part of our purpose to establish a process of permanent exchange of electricity between our two countries.
They are the result of an unprecedented agreement between Uruguay and Brazil, currently under negotiation, which will serve as an example and model for future partnerships.
In the field of trade, our bilateral exchange registered, last year, a historical record, with almost 5 billion dollars. #BrasilUruguai
Brazil is the main destination of Uruguayan exports and its second foreign supplier. #BrasilUruguai
Our trade is characterized by a high proportion of processed and manufactured products, such as those of the automotive sector. #BrasilUruguai
We exchanged views on the current state of the regional integration process. We agree that Mercosur represents an important common patrimony
Mercosur is an ambitious process of integration in our region, thanks to which we have already achieved significant results. #BrasilUruguai
We have also advanced in the expansion of the group, with the incorporation of Venezuela, but we need to move further. #BrasilUruguai
We will continue improving Mercosur, overcoming the difficulties of the economy and diversifying our commercial partnerships #BrazilUruguay
The agreement with the European Union is one of the strategic steps in the area of ​​international trade in the region. #BrasilUruguai
Let us propose to the European Union that we define, as soon as possible, the date of simultaneous presentation of our commercial offers.
Thank you once + President Tabaré Vázquez for your visit. Uruguay and Brazil will continue inseparable partners (...) #BrazilUruguai
... committed to the consolidation of an area of ​​peace, cooperation, democracy and growth with social justice in our continent and in the world.
